TopicTitle: The Name Change Thread (WARNING! ONE TIME ONLY!)

Thank you very much, yes that was a typo. You would think after typing that name into every other account I have for the two years since I started using it would have taught me to spell it right but whatever![:rolleyes:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_rolleyes.gif ":rolleyes:")![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif ":sticktongue:")

More typos
Can my Name be changed to Mars Reconnaissance Orbiter ?

> 
> 
> 2 hours ago, BlackMesaSurvivor said:
> 
> 
> Can my Name be changed to Mars Reconnaissance Orbiter ?
> 

The software says that's longer than 25 characters, which I did not know was a thing. So apparently you may not.

[@Vanamonde](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/27914-vanamonde/) ~~I just realized that " Mars Reconnaissance Orbiter " has 27 letters, which, as you mentioned, is a little bit longer than the limit, but if i remove the spaces like this: MarsReconnaissanceOrbiter~~

~~It will have 25 characters, so... maybe i (or basically you) can change my name to that name i requested, without the spaces?~~

~~oh, and here's a small proof:~~

~~![unknown.png](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/835345222857916467/931736489744801822/unknown.png)~~

Nevermind, i'll think of a better name now.
